snippet: As Delta Air Lines holds talks to buy some or all of Singapore Airlines' 49 percent stake in Virgin Airlines, one question has arisen: What will happen to the holdings of Richard Branson?
abstract: As Delta Air Lines holds talks to buy some or all of Singapore Airlines' 49 percent stake in Virgin Airlines, one question has arisen: What will happen to the holdings of Richard Branson?

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Delta's Talks Over Virgin Stake Raise Questions About Branson's Holdings
